mapper.sql: a.UUID AS "uuid", a.PARTY_ID AS "partyId", a.SYMBOL AS "symbol", a.LIST_ID AS "listId", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_item_user_optional_item a
WHERE a.uuid = #{id} and a.del_flag = 0
